## ISyncEventMessage interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A message sent to the host upon connection of the channel, to indicate to the host that this task supports the protocol and to provide baseline status information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ISyncEventMessage 
```
